Articles.Content: Hello, everyone! I've just recently finished and uploaded the latest video in my KSP YouTube series, inspired in part by Macey Dean. My series has been building up to the events in this video for some time now and I am very proud of my work, so I thought I'd take this opportunity to share it with you. I tried to capture the style of cinematic video reminiscent of Macey Dean's prestigious video 'Far From Home'. I hope you enjoy and feel free to leave a comment or any constructive criticism.
